name: Vision Dive
description:
Get your inline skates on to glide serenely around abstract landscapes, sweeping over hexagons to make them light up!

Made as part of the Curve Digital Skate Jam. I wanted to capture the sense of movement and fluidity of inline skating, rather than make a game focused on tricks and jumps

Best played on Android.

Note: Tutorial is in Compete section. Relax section doesn't have a way back to main menu, so quit the app and restart to go back.
